errors.not_in_dm: This command cannot be used in direct messages.
errors.during_command: Something went wrong while executing this command.

config.spamthreshold_unchanged: Spam threshold stays at {{threshold}} identical messages by the same user.
config.logchannel_not_text: Provided logchannel {{-channel}} is not a text channel.
config.logchannel_no_permissions: The bot needs permissions to embed links, read messages and message history in the provided log channel {{-channel}}.
config.prefetch_updated: Fetching {{number}} messages in the log channel after restart *(enables dynamic button adaptation based on member state and permissions)*.
config.removed_invalid_channels: Cleaned up deleted and invalid channels: {{channels}}.
config.show_spamthreshold_enabled: Identical messages by the same person: {{-formattedCount}}

fetchlog.not_a_log: Provided message does not resolve to a log message

karma.karma_message: {{numtripped}} of {{numtotal}} messages seen in watched channels on this guild have tripped {{numflags}} flags.

notify.notification_change: Set the notification level for {{-entity}} to severity {{-level}}.
notify.notification_change_antispam: Set the notification level for {{-entity}} to severity {{-level}} (notifications on spam enabled)
notify.notification_none: No notifications configured for this guild.

watch.add_channels_permissions_missing: Cannot add channel {{-channels}} (missing permission to view or read message history).
watch.add_channels_permissions_missing_plural: Cannot add channels {{-channels}} (missing permission to view or read message history).
watch.add_channels_wrong_type_thread: Cannot add channel {{-channels}} (threads are watched with their parent channel)
watch.add_channels_wrong_type_thread_plural: Cannot add channels {{-channels}} (threads are watched with their parent channel)

buttons.no_incident: Cannot find an incident associated with this button.
buttons.ban_no_permissions: To use the ban button you need permissions to ban members!
buttons.delete_no_permissions: To use the delete button you need permissions to delete messages in the channel this was flagged in!
buttons.review_no_permissions: To use the review button you need permissions to manage messages in the channel this was flagged in!
buttons.delete_unknown_message: {{-executor}} could not delete the message (unknown message).
buttons.delete_unknown_channel: {{-executor}} could not delete the message (unknown channel).
buttons.delete_missing_permissions: {{-executor}} could not delete the message (missing permissions).

attributes.explain_nsfw: Attributes are not considered in NSFW channels.
attributes.explain_nyt: Trained on a single data source (New York Times comments tagged by their moderation team).

checks.format_perspective_none: Not flagged with any significant attributes.
